scripts.dev: (cd local && docker-compose down || true) && cross-env PORT=3006 npm run launch
scripts.dev-local: (cd local && docker-compose down || true) && cross-env npm_config_yes=true JWT_SECRET="{\"type\":\"HS256\",\"key\":\"3EK6FD+o0+c7tzBNVfjpMkNDi2yARAAKzQlk8O2IKoxQu4nF7EdAh8s3TwpHwrdWT6R\"}" MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3006 DEEPLINKS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SSL=0 DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey PORT=3006 npm run launch
scripts.bundle-all: npm run bundle-mathjs && npm run bundle-jsonschema && npm run bundle-jsonschema-test && npm run bundle-mathjs-test
scripts.package:unbuild: rimraf ./*.js && rimraf ./*.js.map && rimraf ./*.d.ts && (cd ./migrations && rimraf ./*.js && rimraf ./*.js.map && rimraf ./*.d.ts && cd ../) && (cd ./imports && rimraf ./*.js && rimraf ./*.js.map && rimraf ./*.d.ts && cd ../) && (cd ./imports/gql && rimraf ./*.js && rimraf ./*.js.map && rimraf ./*.d.ts && cd ../..) && (cd ./benchmarks && rm -f ./*.js; rm -f ./*.js.map; rm -f ./*.d.ts && cd ..) && (cd ./imports/router && rimraf ./*.js && rimraf ./*.js.map && rimraf ./*.d.ts && cd ../..) && (cd ./tests && rimraf ./*.js && rimraf ./*.js.map && rimraf ./*.d.ts && cd ../)
scripts.package:publish: npm run package:build && npm publish --access public && npm run package:unbuild
scripts.package:release: npm run package:unbuild && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.test: npm run package:build && cross-env DEEPLINKS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SSL=0 DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey DOCKER_DEEPLINKS_URL=http://localhost:3006 NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest --config jest.config.js *.js --testTimeout=50000
scripts.benchmark: export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SSL=0; export DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; ts-node benchmarks/index.ts
scripts.migrate: npm run package:build && npx migrate@latest up --matches '*.js'
scripts.unmigrate: npm run package:build && npx migrate@latest down --matches '*.js'
scripts.migrate-s-h: npm run package:build && npx migrate@latest up 1693460330175-sync-handlers-update --matches '*.js'
scripts.unmigrate-s-h: npm run package:build && npx migrate@latest down 1693460330175-sync-handlers-update --matches '*.js'
scripts.remigrate-s-h: npm run unmigrate-s-h && npm run migrate
scripts.start-deeplinks-docker: cd local && docker-compose pull && docker-compose -p deep up -d
